Frequently Asked Questions

Our retractable banners are designed for quick and easy setup. Simply unroll the banner and attach it to the stand. The entire process takes less than a minute.
Each banner kit includes the printed graphic, aluminum stand, carrying case, and setup instructions. Additional accessories like LED lights or extra stands can be added.
We accept AI, EPS, PDF, and high-resolution JPG/PNG files. For best results, please provide vector files (AI/EPS) with all text converted to outlines.

Technical Specifications

Standard Specifications:

  • Stand Material: Aluminum
  • Base Weight: 15 lbs
  • Printing: High-resolution
  • Case: Included
  • Setup Time: < 1 minute

File Requirements:

  • Format: AI, EPS, PDF, JPG, PNG
  • Resolution: 300 DPI minimum
  • Color Mode: CMYK
  • Bleed: 0.125" all sides
  • Fonts: Converted to outlines
